definitions.name: Bundle Bulk Discounts
definitions.description: Bulk discount tiers for custom bundle builder. Format: 'minQty:discountPercent,minQty:discountPercent' (e.g., '5:0,20:10,40:18' means 5+ items = 0% off, 20+ = 10% off, 40+ = 18% off). Used by custom-bundle-builder.liquid snippet.

definitions.name: Bundle Subscription Discount Override
definitions.description: Override the subscription discount percentage for this product's bundle. Enter a number (e.g., 10 for 10%). If not set, the discount will be fetched from Seal Subscriptions app automatically.

notes.setup_instructions: These metafield definitions must be created in Shopify Admin under Settings → Custom Data → Products. Each definition allows you to upload a list of images specific to that language.
notes.usage: Once created, these metafields will appear in the product editor under the 'Metafields' section. Upload images to each language metafield as needed.
notes.fallback_logic: If a language-specific metafield is empty, the system will fall back to English (images_en), and if that's also empty, it will use the default product.media gallery.
notes.reusable_images: The same image file from Shopify Files can be added to multiple products' metafields, allowing for efficient reuse of common images like certifications or benefits graphics.

bundle_builder.bulk_discounts: Configure quantity-based discount tiers for bundle products. Format is 'minQty:discountPercent' separated by commas. Discounts are percentage-based and stack with subscription discounts. Example: '5:0,20:10,40:18' gives 0% off for 5-19 items, 10% off for 20-39 items, and 18% off for 40+ items.
bundle_builder.subscription_discount: Override the default subscription discount for a specific bundle product. If not set, the bundle builder will automatically fetch the discount percentage from Seal Subscriptions app. Use this only if you need a product-specific subscription discount that differs from your store's default.
